Step - Process Detail
Task Code: TAX_STEP_023\nBIR Form: Step\nPeriod: Process Detail
1. Preparation - Gather data, prepare the BIR Form, and draft the payment request (e.g., check voucher).
Task Code: TAX_1_PREPARATION_024\nBIR Form: 1. Preparation\nPeriod: Gather data, prepare the BIR Form, and draft the payment request (e.g., check voucher).
2. Report Approval - Senior Finance Manager (SFM) reviews and approves the report data for accuracy and compliance. (File Request is submitted to SFM.)

Task Code: TAX_2_REPORT_APPROVAL_025\nBIR Form: 2. Report Approval\nPeriod: Senior Finance Manager (SFM) reviews and approves the report data for accuracy and compliance. (File Request is submitted to SFM.)
3. Payment Approval - The approved report and payment request are routed. Finance Director (FD) reviews and approves the release of funds for remittance.

Task Code: TAX_3_PAYMENT_APPROVAL_026\nBIR Form: 3. Payment Approval\nPeriod: The approved report and payment request are routed. Finance Director (FD) reviews and approves the release of funds for remittance.
4. Filing & Payment - The approved form is Filed and the payment is Remitted (either electronically or over the counter).
Task Code: TAX_4_FILING_PAYMENT_027\nBIR Form: 4. Filing & Payment\nPeriod: The approved form is Filed and the payment is Remitted (either electronically or over the counter).
